<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Intimidating Prowess](/Feats.aspx?ID=797) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="General" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=78" />
<trait label="Skill" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=144" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 262 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
Strength 16; Expert in [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7)

</column>

---

In situations where you can physically menace the target when you Coerce or Demoralize, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to your Intimidation check and you ignore the penalty for not sharing a language. If your Strength score is 20 or higher and you are a master in Intimidation, this bonus increases to +2.
name: Intimidating Prowess
